# Classical Linear regression

{{< include macro.qmd >}}

## Linear regression

-   Suppose we have samples $\{x_i, y_i\}_{i=1}^n$ where $y_i \in \R$ and $x_i \in \R^p$. We want to model the relationship between $x_i$ and $y_i$.
-   The classical linear regression model is $Y = X^T\beta + \varepsilon$, $\varepsilon \sim N(0, \sigma^2)$.
